# connectedClients

**Instance Property**

An array of connected clients.

## Declaration

```swift
var connectedClients: [CMIOExtensionClient] { get }
```

## Discussion

This property is key-value observable.

## Managing Clients

- **notifyPropertiesChanged(_:)**: Notifies connected clients of device property changes.

items.description: Notifies connected clients of device property changes.
